name: Philosophy Quotes
description: A diverse compilation of profound quotes from various philosophers, spanning different eras and schools of thought.
author: Nikhil Kadam

quotes.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: I think, therefore I am.
quotes.author: René Descartes

quotes.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: God is dead. God remains dead. And we have killed him.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The only thing I know is that I know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Man is condemned to be free; because once thrown into the world, he is responsible for everything he does.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: I think; therefore I am.
quotes.author: René Descartes

quotes.quote: He who is not a good servant will not be a good master.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: To do is to be.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: To be is to do.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Man is the measure of all things.
quotes.author: Protagoras

quotes.quote: The only constant in life is change.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Cogito, ergo sum. (I think, therefore I am.)
quotes.author: René Descartes

quotes.quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The more you know, the more you realize you don't know.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
